name: Anime News Bot
description: A bot that fetches and shares anime news from RSS feeds.

CHANNEL_ID.description: Your Telegram channel ID to send news.

RSS_URL.description: RSS feed URL for fetching anime news.

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL.description: ID of the channel to enforce subscription, else put 0.

START_MESSAGE.description: Optional: start message of the bot.
START_MESSAGE.value: Welcome to Anime News Bot! You will receive the latest anime news here.
